title: Thangamey Lyrics Naanum Rowdydhaan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Thangamey onnathaan
Movie: Naanum Rowdydhaan
Music: Anirudh
Lyrics: Vignesh Shivan

Thangamey unnathaan
Thaedi vandhen naaney.
Vairamey oru naal
Unna thookkuveney.

Rasaathiya raathiri paarthaen
Rowdy payyan romantic aanen.
Ragasiyamaa routea potu
Kadathanum kadathanum
Kadathanum unna ..

Vai moodiye vaaya polandhaen
Verum kaalula vinveli ponen.
Verappaa irundhaalum valinjaen
Niruththanum niruththanum
Niruththanum enna .

Black n white-u kannu unna paarthaa
Color-ah maarudhey.

Thuru pudicchcha
kadhal narambellaam
Suru suruppaaga seerudhey

Ava face-u ada da da daaa
Ava shapeu Appa pappa ppa paaaa.

Moththathula ayyyayyayyyoo
ilukudhu Ilukudhu ilukudhu enna ..

Ye nee enna pakkura maadhiri
naan unna paakkalaye.
Naan pesum kadhal vasanam
unakkuthaan kaetkalaye

Adiyae yen kanavula senji
vachcha silaye.
Kodiye en kannukulla
poththi vaippaen unaiye.

Oru billa pola naanum aanaalum
unna nallaa paathuppaeney
ennaalum.

adi yaezhu jennmam anaalum
nee illaama naan illa di.

Thangamey unnathaan
Thaedi vandhen naaney.
Vairamey oru naal
Unna thookkuveney.

Rasaathiya raathiri paarthaen
Rowdy payyan romantic aanen.
Ragasiyamaa routea potu
Kadathanum kadathanum
Kadathanum unna ..

Vai moodiye vaaya polandhaen
Verum kaalula vinveli ponen.
Verappaa irundhaalum valinjaen
Niruththanum niruththanum
Niruththanum enna .

Black n white-u kannu unna paarthaa
Color-ah maarudhey.

Thuru pudicchcha
kadhal narambellaam
Suru suruppaaga seerudhey

Ava face-u ada da da daaa
Ava shapeu Appa pappa ppa paaaa.

Moththathula ayyyayyayyyoo
ilukudhu Ilukudhu ilukudhu enna ..
